p: Hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC) is the sixth commonest and third most lethal solid malignancy on a global scale [ 1]. In spite of the major diagnostic advancements, only one out of three of the newly diagnosed patients are eligible for radical treatments upfront [ 2]. In patients within the Barcelona Clinic Liver Cancer (BCLC) stage 0 or A criteria, surgical resection can be carried out safely with curative intent [ 3].
